subject: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of New York
33 Liberty Street
New York, NY 10045
06/03/2024
 
 
Dear xxx
 
This is to inform you that we have finally received instructions from the Department of Treasury to release your long awaited  compensation/Inheritance payment via ATM Card . This payment from our investigation we discovered you have been trying to receive the payment till this very important and now the good news is your payment is re-approved for your payment 
Note:  From the record in my file, the total amount approved for your payment  is $3.7M. However, we  received a notice of Change of Account from your representative Mr. Julius Fletcher yesterday. In respect to the account received from him, we wish to confirm with you before we proceed with the transfer of your contract fund to the new account he provided.
 
Kindly confirm the below new bank account as valid and endorsed by you for the transfer of your unpaid contract fund.
 
Bank; Bank of America
Address; 690 Adams Street Quincy Ma 02169 USA
A/C Number: 4666 0133 5222
Routing Number: 011000138
Swift Code: BOFAUS3N
A\C Name: Julius Fletcher
 
The transfer will take place immediately you confirm the authenticity of this submitted account to be correct as provided by Mr. Julius Fletcher. I demand an urgent response from you to enable us to proceed with the transfer.
 
Best Regards,
Elizabeth Doe 
Director, Payment Unit

subject: Re: Federal Reserve Bank of New Yo
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update regarding the release of the payment via ATM card. Could you please provide more details about the process for receiving the payment and how I can ensure a smooth transfer to my bank account?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Betty
